title: [Health] People who exercise as they age are more likely to have good brain health than those who take up an activity for shorter periods of time but then give it up. People who were physically active at least one to four times a month in all five separate surveys performed the best on the tests.

[Health] In study of 1.9 million patients, those who were vaccinated had 41% lower chance of heart attack or stroke compared to unvaccinated after COVID-19 infection | Journal of the American College of Cardiology
